channel.title: lazy on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lazy on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Lazy day
item.description: 17:41 Monday 15 July 2019 JST Today after being out late last night at Lin’s sister’s place, I was happy that today is a holiday. I slept a good bit of the day.

item.title: yikes stripes
item.description: 15:38 Monday 15 February 2016 JST I was sick and lazy for a good part of last week and now I’m sorta kinda back on track. Good thing; there are some fun tweaks to old tickets being requested for CB, and I gotta gotta get going on AB.

item.title: Day
item.description: (transcribed 11:10am CST Wednesday 22 January 2003) March 28 (written March 29) Saturday- sleep late. Mom and Dad are gone. I didn't have a lucid dream- try again later. We are supposed to mow today. We didn't do much. We watched cartoons and messed around all day. We didn't get into too much trouble, though.
